Class AbstractServiceWorker

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.cdap.api.service.AbstractServiceWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProgramLifecycle<ServiceWorkerContext>, ServiceWorker, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GuavaServiceWorker
@Beta
public abstract class AbstractServiceWorker
extends Object
implements ServiceWorker

Extend this class to add workers to a custom Service.

stop

public void stop()
Description copied from interface: ServiceWorker
Request to stop the running worker. This method will be invoked from a different thread than the one calling the Runnable.run() ) method.

Specified by:
stop in interface ServiceWorker

destroy

public void destroy()
Description copied from interface: ProgramLifecycle
Destroy is the last thing that gets called before the program is shutdown. So, if there are any cleanups then they can be specified here.

Specified by:
destroy in interface ProgramLifecycle<ServiceWorkerContext>
